name: Reserve - Sueded Oud
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Woody Spices.Key Notes:Oud, Bushman Candle, Skin Musk.Fragrance Description:This unisex perfume is the culmination of smokey darkness contrasted by an airy lightness. The intoxicating dark appeal of oud softened by whispers of light florals and an underlying creamy sweetness creates an exotic fragrance experience that is confident but never overpowering..About the Bottle:CLEAN RESERVE cares about the health of the planet. Working with vendors who use green manufacturing processes and minimizing the amount of waste produced by the packaging is of paramount importance. The cap is made of sustainable wood from Spain. The corn-derived cellophane is biodegradable and compostable..About the Fragrance:Sueded Oud is made with sustainable Bushman’s Candle from Namibia. Using Bushman’s Candle supports the nomadic Himba tribe’s economic development and preservation of their traditional way of life. It is crafted with the people and planet in mind and is always cruelty-free, vegan, gluten-free and phthalate-free.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance, Water, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Phenoxyethanol, Limonene, Citronellol, Linalool, Eugenol...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: got this recently and love it. I love even more how it smells the longer it's on. it also pairs wells with vanilla scented perfumes as well. I know people are saying it doesn't last long. it doesn't last as long if you're directly spraying onto the skin. I spray both my skin and clothes. better longevity on clothes for sure. but I do get several hours of wear directly on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to buy a perfume from the Clean Reserve line. I really like this scent but after a few minutes of putting it on it completely disappears. I noticed that a few other reviews say the same thing. I will not be purchasing from this line again and it’s too bad because I love their scents. Very disappointed.

reviews.review_title: Signature scent - and i do not say that lightly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent truly androgynous scent that is modern, musky, warm and a bit earthy. This and Skin are my two favourites.   You’re only going to like this brand of perfume if  you are ok with a delicate scent.  These are not heavy or potent perfumes. But if you want something fresh and gentle on the nose and your colleagues, then go for it bc you’ll love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Once again I am left disappointed by a clean fragrance. The scent is so light.  134$ is not cheap to be spraying this so generously just to barely smell it and only for it to fade to nothing so quickly (less than an hour) The review below me says this lasts a long time. It's not because I'm going nose blind if I can hardly smell it right after spraying it and it has a strong alcohol smell at first. Some bottles are good and some are weak. I've bought 7 clean fragrances and only one bottle was actually strong. Out of those 7, I bought 2 bottles of the same scent and one bottle was very strong and the other very weak. This is the issue I'm having with clean fragrance and can get no answers from companies as to why or even acknowledge this issue.  Other than that the fragrance is very hard to describe. It's sweeter than I expected, not as earthy/woody. It's nice but because of the weakness it will have to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is stunning! I'm very picky with fragrances but this one is the perfect balance of earthy and floral, and it lasts a long time. My boyfriend compliments me every single time I wear it. Highly recommend to anyone who loves Oud.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a simple and amazing fragrance. Perfect for every day. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love,Love,Love this product!! My fears have com true! ….to read “product is no longer available!” WHY?? A bit expensive, but I’d buy it faithfully,when I’d be running low! It’s such a soft, beautiful scent that would last ALL day, and NEVER had I worn it, and someone say, “You smell good!”  Most importantly, my Husband LOVES it, and would ALWAYS tell me how good I smell!!! How/What do I have to do to BEG them to bring it back???!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this as a base cologne. I get lots of compliments. I find this very versatile. You can wear it on its own or enhance it to more of a night scent by layering it with another cologne. Pairing this and JPG Ultra male is my favour summer time scent.

reviews.review_title: Great staying power and subtly pleasing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect scent for everyday use. I love the subtle and very light scent of it. As it stays longer on my skin, the scent gets better. My husband always tell me to always wear this perfume as he finds it very simple but attractive at the same time. I have gotten lots of compliments  with this perfume. As a hotel front desk agent, I cannot wear overbearing scents, this one is perfect for my work place, despite of having a glass pannel between myself and our hotel guests, the scent still manages to get through and our guests always asks what scent I'm wearing. The best part is, it lasts long! I'll spray 2 sprays on my uniform and 2 on my wrists then I'll tap it on my neck, by the end of my 8hrs shift, it's still there. For me, it really is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells fresh and clean. It smells expensive. It blends with my chemistry in the way I had hoped for. The second note is my favorite. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loooove this scent! I received it as a sample and had to order the full size right away. It is subtle but it lasts all day and I've received a few compliments while wearing this. Also the fact that Clean is vegan and cruelty free is a huge bonus. I would love to check out some of the other scents from this line too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Classy, can be nostalgic, feeling of freedom, like a trip to middle east . Reminds me M7 Yves Saint Laurent, but not intense. It last longer in cold weather, but I don't know if last longer on summer .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is very different. Not a common scent... Subtle... Non-ordinary... Very versatile. Gender-neutral. Something you may be proud when defending you, as an individual

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is what Dubai smells like.... I like it because it seems familiar to me. If you lived in the Middle East this smells exactly like those kiosks that smell perfume. It is a crisp clean scent but definitely oud. It’s really nice in general especially if you like a natural type fragrance. It fades nicely into almost a clean clothes smell it’s probably one of the most interesting scents I’ve smelt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this in one of my Sephora orders. I'm a big fan of woodsy scents, but oud can be very strong and overpowering for everyday wear if not balanced properly. This is a beautiful formulation of this scent. Clean has done a great job marrying oud with sweet notes and florals here, while still having the oud be the star of the show. This is one of the few oud-centered fragrances I would be comfortable wearing to work because of it's subtly. It also lasted really well on my skin, although I know some other reviewers got less mileage out of it. If you like woodsy scents or are looking for a wearable version of oud, this is a really great one to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Sueded Oud as a sample.  First sniff was not impressive, but the fragrance developed into something wonderful within a few minutes.  Now I love it, and on me at least, it lasts a long time.  This is a keeper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is such a beautiful and sophisticated scent.  I usually wear Compitior Sud Pacifique fragrances or Maison Margela Replica by the fireplace. I love all of those scents  ....but my boyfriend says he never even smells me wearing perfume. the other day I got a sample of this stuff and spritzed some on out of curiosity.   when he came home he hugged me and said OMG WHAT ARE YOU WEARING? YOU SMELL SO GOOD. look ...I'm sure alot of boyfriends compliment scents but NOT MINE. He spends an hour on the body wash aisle picking out the perfect body wash each time because it MUST SMELL RIGHT or he wont bathe with it. take it from me...hes picky. I just added a full size of this to my cart because I actually love it too. it smells like clean and soft and elegant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for my boyfriend and he loves it!!! He is very hard to shop for, and will only buy cologne from certain places. He is super picky and only wants high quality scents! He loves it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and absolutely love it! It’s very natural and lasts all day! It’s a great scent!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG I love this.  I'm a dog trainer and go into peoples homes all day and am always on the lookout for scenrs that I think will be universally liked and/or inoffensive.  I love this-smells clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I sprayed this on my wrist at 5pm. It’s now 10pm and I can still smell it easily. I like the scent. It’s mature and a little bit spicy. It’s different than the types of perfumes that I usually get and it will make a great addition to my collection, allowing for more variability.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love oud perfume and this is great for daily use and oud beginners. Will purchase the large size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my standards now. It’s a woody scent but not overly so. Incredibly clean and uplifting. Unisex; I wear it alone but I can see pairing it if you’re into that. Dries down beautifully and gives me a warm, secure feeling. Love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I worked (at the time) at a restaurant, and nothing worse than smelling someone's overwhelming perfume as you're trying to enjoy your meal. This perfume is great because it smells really nice, but doesn't make everyone fall over because it's so strong. The only reason I'm knocking one star off of it is because the scent fades quite quickly and doesn't stick to your skin. My sister says the same thing, so it's not just my body chemistry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My hub wears this and I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received this in Sephora Play box- absolutely love it. I'm going to purchase as a full size. The scent is fresh but not in a citrusy way- almost in a seductive, clean, fresh way? It's very hard to explain but I love the smell. Sometimes I would even spray it before going to bed if I wanted to smell refreshed because the smell is so light but GREAT! I'd recommend to people who love to smell good but don't like OVERPOWERING perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m someone who likes creamy fruity floral sweet but not crying powdery gourmands, this is not that. But I was so impressed by it that when I got a sample I had to buy it. Among othe notes are white flowers, musk, amber, patchouli, suede and even incense. Although it may seem strong at first it dries to soft floral cashmere wood on my skin. It’s the perfect scent for fall and winter. I loved it from first spray, so much, I got me the travel size and the big bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell! My husband loves it too ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not one for very floral/ vanilla smells so I never readily wore perfume. This has become a staple for me. I LOVE the “clean” scent. It’s not too over powering and a lovely feminine woodsy smell. Would recommend smelling it or grabbing a sample next time you’re in Sephora!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is not for me. It’s very interesting but I’m a little more traditionally girly with scent. However, I do have a hard time finding scents that mix w my chemistry and last. This lasted and wasn’t unpleasant, just not my taste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I picked it up for my boyfriend, he loves it and so do I!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great scent, but doesn't last long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very strong smell, but was also very unique and fresh. It took me a hot minute to get used to it, but when I did I loved it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Clean and fresh smells

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For reference, some other scents I love are: Elizabeth & James Nirvana Bourbon Replica By the Fireplace Replica Jazz Club Artelier Cologne Vanille Insensee   In case you can’t tell, I love smokey, woody, vanilla fragrances. This is my first oud perfume and I truly love it! When I first spray it the woodiness is quite prominent and as it settles it gets sweeter - at least on me. I also love this layered with all of the perfumes I mentioned! It’s so lovely and definitely a new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in a gift set with 5 other CLEAN fragrances. This is my introduction to oud scents and I'm quite pleasantly surprised! I thought it would be too heavy but I'm sort of addicted lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my signature perfume!  Love it!  Just ordered the big bottle.  It’s so different from anything else.  Worth a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume reminds me of an old Gucci perfume I had that was discontinued! I was so happy when I smelt this. It’s the complete opposite of average sweet scents on the market. My only complaint is that it’s not long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was a sample and yes the sample didn’t last,but love the fragrance. Purchased the large size and this does last all day and could still smell the next morning! This is a very nice soft frangrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this scent at first since I'm partial to warm scents, but after wearing it a couple more times it really started to smell like tobacco. I'm not a smoker and I felt self-conscious that I smelled like I just went out for a smoke.

I'm quite sad about this one. When I first tried it, I thought I had finally found my new fragrance. The smell is amazing and it suited me quite well. Unfortunately, it doesn't last at all... Bye bye Sueded Oud.

The smell is beautiful after that initial shock of the first few minutes. I only rated it 3 stars because it has zero staying power. (I'm also the type that likes to be smelled without someone having to be on top of you). I had to reapply a few times throughout the day. I felt like it wasn't worth the cost. I have plenty of cheaper perfumes that have much longer staying power.
Absolutely horrible!! I was standing next to a cabinet at work and someone actually said Do you smell that. Something smells rank  I tried to get the smell off me and it I stank forever.
really enjoying this fresh sent

I like the smell of this perfume! It's not a smell I would normally go after but after using it a few times it's growing on me. I love the sample size as well because I can throw it in my clutch when I am going out and I don't have to think about it again!
Terrible scent, glad this came in my play box and I didn't actually buy this.

I like this smell, but it's not my favorite. I love this brand and how versatile it is. You can build and layer with other scents to create your own. Some of the other scents our hands down perfection!

Used to wear Miss Dior Cherie. I had not found a fragrance I liked since that time. Got a sample of this in my Play box and have loved it since. It's warm but not overpowering like Opium and still has a fresh quality. Give it 10 minutes on your skin before you judge it. And the wear time is great. I work 12 hour shifts and it lasts all day! So very happy with this. Well worth the price for a large bottle

This came in my play box and at first I didn't think I would like it, but am pleasantly surprised. It smells great and my husband loves it. Not sure I would pay for the full price of it but if it was gifted to me I would totally wear it.

I tried this on while I was at Sephora 2 hours ago, and I can't stop smelling my wrist. I stopped off to get dog food and got a compliment on how good I smell.   At first sniff I wasn't too sure I liked it. It opened up with a sharp (pimento?), raw, dirty sex (musk? incense?) smell.   Within 10 minutes it softened and I began to smell cypress, fir, and oud. That's when I became hooked.   It only took another 10 minutes or so before suede and amber began to mingle with the cypress, fir, oud, musk, and incense.   Within a few minutes magnolia and honeysuckle blossoms added to the chorus.   Now, over 2 hours in, I'm smelling a hint of jasmine, quite a bit of frankincense, and a touch of sophisticated patchouli - but, I can still smell all the other notes. As it develops, the top notes don't give way to the middle notes, which don't step aside for the base notes. This is a fragrance that keeps building on itself. It's a bewildering, unconventional, labyrinthine scent. I don't think this is a scent everyone will fancy.   On me, Sueded Oud has moderate bordering on heavy sillage. I've now been wearing it for about 2 1/2 hours and although it's fading, I can still smell it, so unfortunately I don't think it's got the greatest longevity.
smells way way way too strong

reviews.review_title: great for clothes in your closet to freshen up
reviews.review_text: I got a sample size of CLEAN Reserve Sueded Oud. Its a SEPHORA EXCLUSIVE. This does smell clean but its not something I like to wear. This perfume is fantastic to spray on your clothes in the closet to give them a clean smell. The scent reminds me of dryer sheets. I would not buy this full size.
Smells amazing very fresh and not too over powering.
smells like men's cologne or maybe something for a much older woman
My fiance loved this on me. He claimed that it was fresh for much longer than most of my other perfumes but wasn't overbearing at the same time.

reviews.review_title: omg smells like church, forest, and sex
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing. On me it pulls like a mix of church (patchouli probably at fault there, as well as other musk notes) and forest, with this underlying sexy smell I can't place. I love it.
Received a sample in my play box and love it. First time wearing it I kept thinking gosh, what is that amazing smell! - only to realize it was me

I received a free sample of this and used nearly all of it within a week. I couldn't get enough so I bought the biggest bottle. I use it every single day and I have gotten so many compliments on the scent. It's amazing. I'll never use another perfume.

I've been a dedicated user of Clinique Happy since forever so there was never a need for me to explore new scents. BUT, this sample of Sueded Oud changed my mind. It has a very unique woodsy yet feminine fragrance. Found myself falling in love with the uniqueness and so I'm going to make a purchase of this perfume.
another great play box product. i really enjoyed the soft clean smell. Can wear this every day to work.
This scent was way too masculine for me. Very earthy, woodsy, and musky. Got it as a sample in my Play Box. Threw away! Will never wear it or consider purchasing.

Not my usual type of perfume, in fact when I first smelled it I only thought it was just ok. I sprayed it on me wrists anyways, and by the end of the day I had fallen in love with the scent. Now I have been using my sample everyday. I will be purchasing this one in full size.

got a sample in my July play box and it is probably the best cologne I've ever smelled. masculine and Woody/earthy. I have a very sensitive nose and can't stand most sprays, but this one goes on and stays on all day without being too overbearing. I've never ever considered spending $100 on a spray, but I think this one changed my mind!

I never wear perfume but when I received this in my beauty box I knew I had found my new sent. It is not flowery or sweet at all. It has a musky, smoked wood scent that is still very feminine. My husband loves it too. I will definitely be purchasing in the full size.
Masculine,earthy,spicey.

I got this in my July play box and I fell in love with this sample when you first spray it smells very woodsy but after awhile it smells very clean I love it I'm going to buy this after I use up my sample!

reviews.review_title: Wonderful soft sexy fragrance for summer
reviews.review_text: Despite the presence of patchouli and musk, this fragrance is extremely soft yet sexy. Because of the light hand in blending, it is suitable for Summer and daytime wear. It won't choke everyone in the elevator but smells clean, warm and light during a hug or close handshake. I am not normally a fan of very flowery fragrances but this is well balanced. The only reason to give 4 instead of 5 stars is that it does need a light respray once or twice during the day as the fragrance fades. The pricing is good for a quality fragrance is reasonable for a full season's supply.
I love this scent and It lasted all day.I will be buying this one soon!
I loved the scent. I personally don't think it was too masculine it just has a really clean scent.
If you enjoy earthy, woodsy, and very musky perfumes you will love this one. I don't. Too masculine for me.
too musky? for me... if that's the word. I never like my play perfume samples..
I love perfume samples! This one smells good but it smelled more masculine, in my opinion. Not really for me.

I am not a perfume person, but I got this in my July Play box and it's really lovely. Most perfumes smell really overpowering and too much for me, but this is nice and subtle. Even my boyfriend, who really does not like perfume, said it was nice. It's a musky scent, but lighter than a men's musk. The lightness makes it feel really nice for summer.

I received this scent in my July Play Box and have slowly fallen in love. At first I was skeptical because the masculine undertones, but as the scent dried on my skin I loved it. I can definitely see where some may be turned off but for me, I love it....so much I went to by the full size product. (Note the full sized product is a much more concentrated smell, so spray lightly) The great thing about it is that it still has a softness that makes it feminine while giving a slight sense of musk, which I'm not normally drawn to.
I love the sample I got. A little goes a long way, so spray carefully!

Fragrance is SO subjective. I wish we had the option of having a fragrance in our play boxes, or to not have any fragrances sent to us. I'm not even going to give it away to a friend/family member because I'll have to smell it on them.
This is one of the strongest perfumes I've ever smelled, not my fave
This smells nice but definitely not feminine. Smells like something my husband would wear.

reviews.review_title: Smells just like my mom the chain smoker
reviews.review_text: I opened my Play box and everyone suddenly wondered where the cigarettes were coming from. I cautiously sniffed the sample and was filled with love and nostalgia because it smelled just like my mom's perfume that never quite hid her 2 pack a day habit.   On the plus side, I'm perfume sensitive and this did not give me a headache.

reviews.review_title: Omg I think I found my new Perfume
reviews.review_text: I received it in my July playbox. I Love It! its soft, woody, & a bit sweet. its perfect for date night
Got the sephora play box which I highly recommend and got this little sample in my box it's so clean but with a little warmth definitely buying a full size tonight!
I got a sample of this and I love it. Most perfume samples that come my way just remind me of those perfume ad pages in my mom's fashion magazines when I was a kid. This one is beautiful and unique.

As in getting older I'm becoming picky with my scents. I can't do sweet, fruity, citrus, floral...you get the gist. I have been drawn to strong cologne - musky, woodsy scents. THIS is perfect. It's not strong (well maybe at first) it settles so beautifully. I can't get enough.
This smells amazing and makes me feel like a wood elf but it doesn't last long..
smells amazing not overpowering but doesn't last so i wont be repurchasing

Clean Reserve Sueded Oud is a MUST have in your fragrance collection.  It's sophisticated, not over powering, lasts all day and a compliment provoker! People literally stop me in the street and ask what fragrance I am wearing. I like it's sustainability story and the fact that I can layer it with any of the other Clean Reserve fragrances to customize my very own signature scent. Brilliant!
Everyone who has smelled this fragrance (in the bottle and/or on me) has loved it. It's a refined, confident, woody scent that goes as well with a business suit as it does with a bathing suit.
I received a sample of this and instantly fell in love ! I have allergies and cannot wear many fragrances. I can wear this and no headache! Its a nice change! Sadly, this is out of my budget!

Has a very different smell to the classic perfumes of women, always flowers and cloying aromas, I have always liked the smell of wood, and finally I found the perfect perfume! It has a slightly masculine touch but it does not lose its femininity, I love it! I apply only a little, and I can smell all day, very good fixative.

This is the first time I have ever smelled oud and I am in love with it. There's almost a salty air smell to this perfume, which sounds unpleasant, but smells amazing. I don't know if many people around me like it, but my dad who hates perfumes actually likes the smell. It's an unexpected scent and if you want a perfume that feels truly like it's your scent and you like woodsy smells I recommend this. I received this as a sample, sadly I can't afford this perfume yet so I've only been wearing it on occasion as it's pretty expensive, for me anyway. You only really need a few sprays and it's fragrant but not overly and it lasts all day for me.
If you love Juliet Has a Gun Midnight Oud, then you'll love this too. A little more subtle and great for everyday. Smells warm and decadent.
I got this as a sample and on me it smells like church. Like incense, dusty velvet, and drying flowers. I wouldn't really wear this but it has a very weird vibe.

I received a sample of Reserve Sueded Oud with a sample of Blonde Rose for layering. I didn't like the layered scent at all, mainly because I wasn't fond of Blonde Rose. Sueded Oud, however, surprised me.  This is my first try of an Oud fragrance. I found the scent to be smooth, when I tend to find woodsy scents unpleasantly sharp.  There are so many notes in this fragrance that I expected it to be overwhelming, but it's not.  While I can't pick out any floral, I do find the fragrance pleasant. It's not something I'd wear every day, but if I were a bigger fan of woodsy scents, I might.

I received a sample of this and gave it to my boyfriend to try it out. I'm an HSP and very sensitive to scents and odors, they can be toxic to me and I can have an extreme reaction to them. I always advice him to be courteous and never to bathe himself in cologne but that's just common sense, but this is a very nice cologne that he can wear lightly. He isn't much into cologne but when I can get him off his motorcycle and dressed up, atleast we're finding options that are suitable for the both of us. Drawback: the price!
If I was a woodland fairy who was made of dreams I would smell like this, probably
This to me smells like whiskey or in other words the smell of a bar countertop. This may be wonderful for some, but for me this smell makes me nauseous. Definitely smell it before you buy it!
Very clean smell, sexy but not overpowering and long lasting with just 2 squirts. Received this as a sample and will definitely purchase a bottle when its done!

I've just received this as a sample, and am writing my first review! I was unsure of the intended gender of this scent so I looked it up here and am thrilled to find it's unisex. For reference, I'm female. I love that beyond the woodsy, musky scents, you'll find the sweet and soothing florals.   I love perfumes and scents in general, and would have to say this one is not as strong or overwhelming as others I've tried recently. I can see this requiring some touch up over hours of time or if you're up against a crowd. For me though, it is perfect as is. I'd much rather have a scent be an extension of yourself instead of enveloping the room.  Value: The best advice is to always try a sample of a scent before committing. The pricing seems appropriate, and at least if you decide to move on from this, you know you can pass it on to any gendered individual with no fuss.
Best 90 bucks I've ever spent. 2 squirts and the smell stays on until I shower/wash my clothes. I'm obsessed with this smell!
I adore this fragrance!  It's woodsy and light and fresh and so perfect!  I got this as a sample in a promo bag but will definitely be purchasing a full size. I can see this being my scent :)
I love it, OMG - its so wonderful - CLEAN !!!  Two little squirts and it still smells fabulous.  Long lasting, clean, fabulous
Warm, sexy, carefree, yet light and delightful.  I love it!
This scent is AH-mazing! It's my new standard and I can't recommend it highly enough.
This is a completely different scent for me but I love it! The only problem is it doesn't last. I have to carry a small bottle to refresh the scent after a few hours.

This is a very soft woodsy scent and a very interesting scent (in a good way). After it settles on your skin it changes very slightly but still just as good as when you first spray it on. Not over powering and very pleasant. It is a little more masculine and so different from anything I own, so I am excited to wear it as a female and see the reactions I get to it.
Smells great. Fresh clean woody scent, but only last a few hours. Very light scent. Wish it was stronger and lasted longer.

I kind of became obsessed with oud after I tried this. The first time I put it on it almost smelled like beer to me? I thought it was really quite strange. Slowly I got accustomed to it and then decided I couldn't live without it. But then I wondered if this oud is good, how do I know this is the best oud for me? This one is light but still very woodsy and musky. It's not overpowering and I don't get complaints about it at work which is a big plus when most of your day is spent there. The price point seems steep but if you compare it to Tom Ford or the Juliette has a gun line - it's actually a steal because it's a pretty big bottle. It's pretty much a staple for me. This scent is unisex but for reviewer purposes I am a lady.

I am obsessed with this scent. It's earthy and woodsy and smells so amazing. It's masculine yet not so overpowering that it can't also be feminine. My issue with it is that it has no staying power :( After an hour, I can't even tell I'm wearing perfume : I would have given it 5 stars if only it lasted longer.
I love this fragrance! It's like nothing I've ever smelled before! I get leather, smoke, oud, and musk from this without a doubt. It smells like a hot man to me... and I love that. :)

It's interesting to note that a label named clean is marketing an OUD fragrance. Oud is known to be dirty, sweaty, naughty and sometimes even fecal - but it's also warm, sweet, spicy and woodsy depending on variety. I don't smell any oud in this fragrance but it's still a quite pleasant scent that lasts fairly long. In fact, longevity is impressive as this has lasted on my skin for 2 days, post shower and sleep. It reminds me a bit of Tom Ford's Oud Wood in the drydown stage which makes this an absolute bargain. I find it quite unisex and with good sillage. Overall, a pleasant surprise and the only one from the reserve line that I like

I love this perfume!!! I would have gave it 5 stars. But when I wear it after two hours the smell fade away. I always carry it with me so I can spray it constantly. For the proce I paid, it is not good deal. But as a perfums, it is great

Have always been a fan of oud, but this Clean scent brings it to irresistible! It carries a clean fresh scent with the woody spice of oud hiding deliciously inside. If you can carry off a spicier scent, then this is a must have for you!  I see reviews saying it doesn't last long, perhaps that's conflicting chemistry with their skin. It lasts all day at work and then some for me. Have gotten TONS of compliments, so if you wear it get used to both men and women saying you smell wonderful! What are you wearing?!
I absolutely love the clean scent.  I will buy this over and over.
This puts a smile on my face the moment that I spray it. Intoxicating.Delicate and delicious. Unfortunately not long lasting :(

A Sephora associate recommended the Clean Reserve line to me recently. I love the scent, especially as it doesn't have any alcohol or chemical odors. It smells eartjy bit not too masculine. I only wish that it was more long lasting. There's only a hint of it by the afternthe, making it necessary to reapply.

reviews.review_title: great scent for a short while
reviews.review_text: I just sprayed this on and immediately fell in love with it. It reminded me of waking up next to my husband in the morning. I guess his deodorant? Haha. The downside is that it doesn't last long at all. I couldn't even smell it after 10 minutes.

I had the same experience as another reviewer - this scent simply did not last.  It's a perfectly lovely starter oud, and goes for the unusual combination of jasmine with the oud (usually it's paired with rose for women) but it disappeared within half an hour on me. Since longevity tends to depend on your body chemistry, here's some info on me: sweets tend to turn super sweet on me, citrus becomes overpowering, and they'll last forever on me.  Unfortunately, I like neither citrus nor sweet scents, but I have found woodsy/oriental fragrances that last for ages on me.  This is unfortunately not one of them. I would recommend this to someone who wants to dip a toe into the magical world of oud fragrances.  There's a reason why oud has been a popular scent for hundreds of years - it's amazing when done right.  Try this if the two Juliette Has a Gun ouds that Sephora carries are simply too overpowering for you.  I wish I could give this a higher rating, but it simply didn't work with my body chemistry.
Love the smell, so light and fresh.  The scent doesn't last very long.

reviews.review_title: It's everything I have been looking for.
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and fell in love with it. The scent is absolutely divine and I get compliments every time I wear it.   The scent lasts all day. I am a hair stylist and constantly have my hands in water all day long, but at the end of the day, I can still smell the beautiful and subtle scent on my wrists and clothes. Not only that, but my guests will compliment me constantly on my perfume, as well as friends, even AFTER going to the gym!   I am very picky about the scents I wear, because I do not like smelling up a room, let alone my own personal space. I am not sure why others feel the scent dissipates quickly considering you really shouldn't be able to consistently smell yourself all day.  I have nothing bad to say about it! I have found my new favorite!

This is a really good perfume for an Oud beginner like me. I tried Juliette has a gun Midnight Oud and that one was really challenging and difficult to wear (very unique though). Sueded Oud on the other hand combines the Oud wood with Praline and Amber which gives the fragrance a milky element. They give a perfect balance making it a sweet scent instead of a sharp plain Oud scent.

I am new to the CLEAN fragrance line but I really like the Oud scent - this fragrance is lighter than most which I like for day time wear. Another review said the scent wore off quickly but I have worn the perfume multiple times and still smell the scent on my skin after 8 hours + so it may be a difference in skin types. Very pleased with the perfume and definitely recommend for fragrance lovers of light, fresh with wood undertones.

I received a sample of this, and am planning on purchasing a full bottle. This scent is beautiful. There are so many layers to it (as you can see form the notes list), but they blend magically together. It's a strong, unique scent. The incense is heavy (why I love this), so if you're not a fan of a strong, heady smell like incense, you may not like this. This scent just feels completely warm. Definitely a nighttime scent, but I'm planning on wearing it all the time. Length of scent is good too!

My husband and I are great fans of perfumes with oud. I really loved this the first time I smelled it, because it has the unique scent of leather. It doesn't last all day, but it's so worth it. I find it to be very fresh and great for the spring/summer. I am in love with it.
My husband smells so great in this scent! I wanted to buy the full size but I think 90$ is a little overpriced for this scent.
Beautiful sophisticated scent. I love it on its own and I also combine this with Flowerbomb and it a good balance for me.

I wish this scent lasted a lot longer. Most ouds I have last for most of the day. With this clean, warm and soft oud only lasted a bit over an hour on me. I will try and layer it over some unscented lotion to see if that might help lock it in!

As an Oud enthusiast, I really loved this take on the traditional fragrance. It smells like the dry down of stronger oud perfumes. It's a crisp, sweet and clean modern oud. This is definitely a mild scent, but nonetheless I really enjoyed it. Unfortunately it completely faded after a few hours.
